Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.convert

@Export @Version("2.20.2") package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.convert
TypeConverter plugins for converter strings into various types. These plugins are used for parsing plugin attributes in plugin factory methods.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins
    Annotations for Log4j 2 plugins.
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.util
    Utility and manager classes for Log4j 2 plugins.

    Description
    CoreTypeConverters
    General TypeConverter implementations.

    Parses a String into a BigDecimal.
    CoreTypeConverters.BigIntegerConverter
    Parses a String into a BigInteger.
    CoreTypeConverters.ByteArrayConverter
    Converts a String into a byte[].
    CoreTypeConverters.CharArrayConverter
    Converts a String into a char[].

    Converts a String into a Charset.

    Converts a String into a Class.
